ul.li: SpinalCordAssessment is a kind of SpinalCordEvent

section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains summary information about the Spinal Injury of the patient.
This class contains summary information about the Spinal Injury of the patient.

stentry.p: Contains the codes to identify the tyeps of Epsiode of Care for the veteran i,e inpatient, rehab etc. Contains the codes to identify the tyeps of Epsiode of Care for the veteran i,e inpatient, rehab etc.
Unique identifier for the Spinal Cord event. Unique identifier for the Spinal Cord event.
Contains the date the veteran received Patient Education Contains the date the veteran received Patient Education
Contains the Code Set that identifies the tyepe of score for the Assessment tool. Contains the Code Set that identifies the tyepe of score for the Assessment tool.
Division the patient is currently assigned. Contains the Division with in the VA which provided the patient Education.

Association to the class that identifies the information regarding the spinal cord injury medical complications for the patient. Association to the class that contains information regarding the spinal cord injury medical complications for the patient.
Association to the class that identifies the physical location of the services being provided for the spinal cord injury patient. Association to the location to which the patient is assigned.
